post:
Hello!

We want to announce special BlackFriday promotion for our LowEndTalk friends:)

Virtual server: **1 core / 1GB / 40GB SSD / 4TB bandwidth** with **45% discount** annually

**Singapore (SG)** - 39 EUR/year [Order link](https://my.ru-tld.ru/manager/billmgr?startpage=vds&startform=vds.order.1&price=3653&promocode=LowEndTalkBlackFriday)

**DE, NL, US** : 36 EUR/year [Order link](https://my.ru-tld.ru/manager/billmgr?startpage=vds&startform=vds.order.1&price=3567&promocode=LowEndTalkBlackFriday)

All virtual servers are on LeaseWeb cloud platform which have been recently upgraded to all SSD storage.

Also we along with virtual servers we provide 25% discount on all dedicated servers. Just check our website and contact us via online chat in case of any questions.
